TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MimeParameterWriter extends System.Web.Services.Protocols.MimeFormatter
Public MustInherit Class MimeParameterWriter Inherits MimeFormatter

summary.span: 为使用 HTTP 实现但不支持 SOAP 的 Web 服务客户端提供传出请求参数编写器的通用基实现。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for writers of out-going request parameters for Web service clients implemented using HTTP but without SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和中的其他类命名空间支持通过 HTTP GET 和 HTTP POST 操作的 Web 服务的.NET Framework 的实现。 and other classes in the namespace support the .NET Framework's implementations of Web services via the HTTP-GET and HTTP-POST operations. Web 服务作者和读者序列化和反序列化，分别之间的参数或返回对象的 Web 方法和 HTTP 请求或响应流。Web service writers and readers serialize and deserialize, respectively, between the parameters or return objects of Web methods and the HTTP request or response streams. Web 服务作者和读者使用 HTTP 传输，但不交换使用 SOAP 标准的消息。Web service writers and readers use HTTP for transport but don't exchange messages using the SOAP standard. 类建立到 HTTP 请求流的客户端编写的 Web 方法参数的常见请求写入格式。The class establishes a common request-writing format for client-side writing of Web method parameters into HTTP request streams. 您通常不需要使用或直接其子代类。You will typically not need to use or its descendant classes directly. 相反，当 Wsdl.exe 工具生成的 HTTP GET 或 HTTP POST 实现根据客户端代理代码，它适用每个 Web 方法，并设置该属性的为适当的类型的属性。Instead, when the Wsdl.exe tool generates client proxy code according to the HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST implementations, it applies the to each Web method and sets the attribute's property to the appropriate type.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetRequestUrl(string url, object[] parameters) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetRequestUrl (url As String, parameters As Object()) As String
public: virtual System::String ^ GetRequestUrl(System::String ^ url, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ parameters);
abstract member GetRequestUrl : string * obj[] -> string override this.GetRequestUrl : string * obj[] -> string

param.name: url
param.span: HTTP 请求的原始统一资源定位符 (URL)。

span.span: The HTTP request's original Uniform Resource Locator (URL).

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要添加到 URL 中的 Web 方法参数值（如果需要）。

span.span: The Web method parameter values to be added to the URL, if necessary.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，修改传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, modifies the outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

returns.span: 一个 对象，包含已修改的传出 HTTP 请求的统一请求定位符 (URL)。

span.span: A object that contains the modified, outgoing HTTP request's Uniform Request Locator (URL).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的类，则只修改 HTTP 请求 URL。Of the classes derived from , only modifies the HTTP request URL.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

value.span: 用于将参数写入到 HTTP 请求的编码。

span.span: The encoding used to write parameters to the HTTP request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码，由表示类中，定义如何将字符转换为一个字节序列。An encoding, as represented by the class, defines how to transform characters into a sequence of bytes.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将 Web 方法参数值序列化到传出 HTTP 请求的正文中。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body.

value.span: 如果 Web 方法的参数值序列化到传出 HTTP 请求的正文中，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the Web method parameter values are serialized to the out-going HTTP request body; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否调用方法。The property determines whether the method is invoked. 类的实现返回的值为`false`。The class's implementation of returns a value of `false`. 唯一的派生类，并重写是，其实现返回的值为`true`。The only derived class that overrides is , whose implementation returns a value of `true`.
